description: Dell's XPS line has been getting a lot of praise over the past two years, and we're pretty much on board with the positive reviews.
specification:
Model: Dell XPS 15
RAM: 32GB (2x16384MB) DDR4
Drive: 2TB SSD NVMe
CPU: AMD Ryzen™ 7 3700U
Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 10
OS: Windows Education 10
Warranty: 60 months

description: A new budget offering has landed in our hands and although the Lenovo Ideapad 3 15 Ultraslim doesn't offer powerful hardware capabilities, the laptop has an amazing design and build quality.
specification:
Model: Lenovo Ideapad 3 15 UltraSlim
RAM: 8GB DDR4
Drive: 500GB SSD NVMe
CPU: Intel Celeron N4120
Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600
OS: Windows 11 Professional
Warranty: 24 months

description: Helios 700 features state-of-the-art cooling with our specially designed AeroBlade™ all-metal fan technology to reach maximum performance potential.
specification:
Model: Predator Helios 700
RAM: 32GB DDR4
Drive: 512GB SSD NVMe
CPU: Intel Core i9-10980HK
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER
OS: Windows 10 Professional
Warranty: 36 months
